item.title: Apple Quietly Drops the Beats Studio Pro by 49% to Offload ANC Headphone Stock
item.content:encoded:
Looking for a new pair of headphones tha sound great but won’t cost an entire paycheck? You might not believe it, but you can get a pair of Beats Studio Pro headphones for a fantastic price. And they sound great, too.

The Beats Studio Pro are exactly what you’re looking for, and they’re more than affordable. You can get them at Amazon for $179.95, which is a $170.05 (49%) discount from their original price of $349.95. If you ask us, that’s a significant price cut.

See at Amazon

Headphones with booming bass and crisp treble in a slick package

This model is perfect for anyone looking to be fully immersed in whatever they’re doing (listening to music, podcasts, etc.). Their ear cups are well-cushioned and extremely comfortable, so you can wear them for extended periods of time without them starting to hurt. The adjustable headband lets you customize the headphones’ fit, so you can tighten them or loosen them as you see fit.

The Beats Studio Pro excel when it comes to delivering quality audio, and that’s what you’re here for, right? These headphones are able to produce precise and detailed sound no matter what type of music you like to listen to. The bass is deep and full but doesn’t overpower the midrange and treble. Plus, the vocal clarity is crisp and clear.

Another feature of the Beats Studio Pro is the active noise cancellation that helps eliminate ambient noise so you can focus on your audio without distractions. No matter where you may be (on a crowded train, in a busy office, etc.) the ANC feature can make a serious difference. In addition to blocking out distractions, the Studio Pro headphones also have a feature called “Transparency Mode” that lets you allow outside noises in so you can hear what’s going on even when wearing the headphones.

In terms of battery life, the Beats Studio Pro can give you several hours of playback time on a single charge. In addition to the battery life, the carrying case of the headphones is capable of getting you back up to speed quickly so you are ready to go again. Fast charging is supported by the headphones so you can obtain a meaningful boost to the battery in a short period of time.

All in all, the Beats Studio Pro are a combination of powerful sound, comfort and intelligent features in a product that not only looks great but also performs exceptionally well. And you’re not going to find a better deal for some time, being that we’ve reached the end of the holiday gifting season. That means you should snap yours up while you still can.
